elements.text: You have just been given a job in an office that you really like. To get the promotion you want, you know that you will have to work very hard for several years. As you envision your position in the company down the road, you think the job you want will be filled by...

elements.name: Working to Get Ahead_Mental Health_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
